rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Accessible entrance with wide door and ramp for wheelchair access. Designed to lead into the main living area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering a west-facing view. Bohemian decor with mixed textures and vibrant colors.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, featuring an open plan for social gatherings and family meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with accessible design; integrated seating area and ample storage.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with built-in closet and en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with ergonomic setup, natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, designed for concentration and privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Larger master suite featuring an ensuite bathroom. Bohemian style elements integrated throughout the space.

rooms.name: Balcony/Patio Area
rooms.description: Open balcony area with seating and garden integration; serves as a transitional space between indoor and outdoor living.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1
rooms.description: Accessible bathroom on the upper floor with grab bars and non-slip flooring.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed with ample natural light and bohemian accents.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom offering a calm environment, perfect for relaxation.

rooms.name: Bathroom 2
rooms.description: Second accessible bathroom on the upper floor featuring wheelchair-friendly fixtures.

openings.accessibility: Wheelchair accessible alternative elevator is planned.

openings.height: Standard height windows for natural light
